author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: MNC Media Investment sales jump 82%
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors)MNC Media Investment Ltd (ASX: MIH) has achieved record sales of US42.4 million in the first half of 2015 almost 82% up from the previous corresponding period.

This is due to growing mobile games and social ecommerce sales in China.

Mobile games revenue in China jumped 74% to US31.7 million while social e-commerce sales more than doubled to US5.5 million.

Gross profit was up by 37% to US10.7 million during the same period while net loss fell to US0.2 million from US1.9 million.

MNC is benefitting from trends in China where online sales are growing at an annual rate of 25%.

In addition nearly 80% of Chinese consumers who bought online last year made at least one purchase from a smartphone while 20% are weekly mobile shoppers.

Indeed research firm Forrester has estimated that revenues from Chinaâ€™s digital commerce market will continue to grow 19.9% annually to hit US1 trillion by 2019. 

Of this mobile sales saw a staggering 168.3% year on year increase to 58.4 billion according to iResearch.

The company had US105.6 million in cash and cash equivalents as at 30th June 2015.
